text: [Ej pajomʙar] In [xaʙar] az xaʙarhoi ƣajʙest, ki ʙa tu vahj mekunem va tu hangome ki [ulamoi mazhaʙi jahud] qalamhoi xudro [ʙaroi qur'akasi ʙa oʙ] meafkandand, to [ta'jin kunand, ki] kadom jak sarparastii Marjamro ʙa uhda girad, nazdason naʙudi; va [niz] vaqte ki [ʙa sari in mavzu'] ʙo jakdigar kasmakas mekardand, kanorason huzur nadosti
